segments.text: Good morning . Do you have a small house for the 18th and 19th of this month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... One or two bedrooms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , sir . We can accommodate you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You do allow pets , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . We don't allow dogs or cats .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I don't have a dog or a cat .
segments.speaker: S1
